name: Slitherlink Infinite
description:
Slitherlink Infinite offers unlimited enjoyment of the classic logic puzzle with a generator and hundreds of handmade puzzles.

Features:
-Over 300 handmade puzzles of varying size, from 7x7 all the way to giant 50x50 puzzles, ranging in difficulty from very easy to very hard
-A puzzle generator that provides new puzzles on demand, with three difficulty levels, from size 5x5 to 20x20
-Zoomable and draggable playing grid
-Autodetection of solving errors and puzzle completion
-Autosave of progress on all puzzles
-No microtransactions, no ads, no social media integration, nothing but unlimited slitherlinks waiting to be solved
